Wat is GHRP-2?

GHRP-2 (Growth hormoon Releasing peptide-2, Pralmorelin) is a synthetisch hexapeptide that stimulates growth hormoon release through activatie of the ghrelin receptor (GHS-R1a). GHRP-2 is considered more selective than GHRP-6, producing robust GH release with less pronounced effects on eetlust, cortisol, and prolactin.

The peptide’s improved Selectiviteitsprofiel makes it valuable for studying GH secretion mechanisms without confounding orexigenic effects.

peptide Shop levert onderzoekskwaliteit GHRP-2 with Gegarandeerd ≥99% zuiverheid.

Hoe werkt GHRP-2 Werken?

GHS-R Activatie

  • Ghrelin receptorbinding - Primary mechanisme
  • Selective GH release - Enhanced specificity vs GHRP-6
  • Somatostatin suppression - Reduced inhibitory tone
  • GHRH synergy - Enhanced combined effects

Selectiviteitsprofiel

  • Minimal eetlust effects - Less orexigenic than GHRP-6
  • Lower cortisol impact - Improved hormonal profile
  • Reduced prolactin - Cleaner research tool

Onderzoekstoepassingen

GH-as Studies

  • GH secretion - Release mechanisms
  • GHRP comparisons - selectiviteit research
  • Hypofysefunctie - Somatotrope biology

FAQ

GHRP-2 is used to study groeihormoon secretion, ghrelin receptor activation, en somatotrope function. It's considered more selective than GHRP-6 with less appetite stimulation.

GHRP-2 is more selective for GH release with less appetite stimulation en lower cortisol/prolactin effects than GHRP-6, making it useful for studying isolated GH secretion.

GHRP-2 is eenlso kNeewn as Pralmorelin en was one of the first synthetic GH secretagogues studied clinically for GH deficiency onderzoek.

Bewaar lyophilised GHRP-2 at -20°C. Eenmaal gereconstitueerd, Bewaar bij 2-8°C en use within 4 weken.

Onze GHRP-2 is ≥99% zuiver zoals geverifieerd door HPLC. Elke batch bevat a Analysecertificaat.

Ja, GHRP-2 with GHRH analogs is een common onderzoek combination for studying synergistic GH release mechanisms.

Reconstitueer in steriel bacteriostatisch water. Voeg oplosmiddel langzaam toe en voorzichtig zwenken to oplossen.

GHRP-2 is beschikbaar in 5mg en 10mg flacons.
